name: Tommy Moe's Winter Extreme: Skiing & Snowboarding
name_original: Tommy Moe's Winter Extreme: Skiing & Snowboarding
description: Tommy Moe's Winter Extreme: Skiing & Snowboarding is a winter sports video game for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System that uses skiing and snowboarding as extreme sports in either freestyle, training mode, or competition mode. The game is known as Ski Paradise with Snowboard (スキーパラダイス WITH スノーボード) in Japan and Val d'Isere Championship in Europe.
